questions.question: What is the dominant pattern visibly present on the majority of the shoe's upper surface?
What color is the most prominent in the shoe's pattern, aside from black?
Considering the visible texture, what material appears to constitute the shoe's upper?
Describing the shape of the shoe's toe, is it pointed, rounded, or square?
What color is the visible portion of the shoe's sole, primarily on the heel?
What is the most noticeable secondary color within the leopard print of the shoe?
Observing the heel, how would you classify its height: flat, low, or high?
What is the overall style of the shoe, such as loafer, pump, or sandal?
Judging by the image, what is the apparent construction of the shoe's heel?
Considering the visible part, what material seems to form the shoe's lining?
From the back view, how would you describe the visible shape of the shoe's vamp?
Disregarding the pattern, what is the primary color family observed on the shoe's body?
Based on the image, does the shoe exhibit a visible decorative element besides the pattern?
Observing the heel, is there any noticeable stitching or visible joining line?
What is the general condition of the visible parts of the shoe, considering any flaws or damage?
